title: Mini Apple Crumble
subtitle: Dessert Mission
desc: A lesson in texture. Learn to contrast soft, warm stewed fruit with a crunchy, buttery topping.

vocab.def: To cut food into small, precise cubes.
To squish butter into flour using fingertips.

steps.title: Safety Cutting
steps.desc: Wash the apple. Place it flat on the board. Cut it into 4 big pieces. Slice each piece into strips, then turn them to cut into small cubes.
steps.note: Use 'Claw Hand' to hide your fingertips!

steps.title: Flavor Coating
steps.desc: Put all your apple cubes into the foil cup. Sprinkle the Brown Sugar and Cinnamon over them. Use a spoon to mix it gently.
steps.note: Make sure every cube has sugar on it.

steps.title: Magic Sand
steps.desc: In a bowl, mix Flour and Sugar. Drop in the Cold Butter cubes. Use your thumbs and fingers to squish the butter into the flour until it looks like wet beach sand.

steps.title: Crunch Factor
steps.desc: Pour the Rolled Oats into your 'sand'. Stir them in gently. We want the oats to stay whole so they get crunchy.

steps.title: The Blanket
steps.desc: Pour the crumble mix loosely over the apples. Do not pack it down tight! We want air gaps so the juice can bubble up.

title: The Power Sandwich
subtitle: Lunch Mission
desc: The ultimate savory stack. Master the art of layering flavors and frying the perfect egg.

steps.title: Heat Check
steps.desc: Put the pan on the stove (Medium Heat). Add a tiny square of butter. Watch it melt. When it stops foaming and goes quiet, it is ready.

steps.title: The Crack
steps.desc: Tap the egg on the counter to make a crack. Pull the shell apart over the pan. Let the egg slide in gently.

steps.title: Golden Toast
steps.desc: While the egg cooks (white part turns solid), put your bread in the toaster. When it pops up, spread Mayo on one side of each slice.
steps.note: Mayo protects bread from getting soggy.

steps.title: The Tower
steps.desc: Build it in this exact order: Bread (Bottom) -> Lettuce -> Tomato -> Hot Egg -> Cheese -> Bread (Top).
steps.note: The hot egg melts the cheese for you!

steps.title: Triangle Cut
steps.desc: Press the sandwich down with your flat hand. Use a serrated knife (bumpy edge) to saw across from corner to corner.
steps.note: Saw back and forth, don't just push.

title: Tropical Fizz
subtitle: Chemistry Mission
desc: A lesson in density and states of matter. Create a refreshing, gradient-colored drink.

vocab.def: Why heavy syrup sinks to the bottom.
To decorate food so it looks nice.

steps.title: Ice Mountain
steps.desc: Fill your glass to the very top with ice cubes. We need lots of ice so the drink stays freezing cold and the layers don't mix.

steps.title: The Heavy Layer
steps.desc: Pour the Orange Syrup directly over the ice. Watch it sink to the bottom. It sinks because sugar is heavier than water!
steps.note: See the orange layer at the bottom?

steps.title: Bubble Protection
steps.desc: Tilt the glass sideways. Pour the Soda Water slowly down the side of the glass. If you pour too fast, the bubbles will die!
steps.note: Go slow to keep the fizz.

steps.title: Gentle Wake Up
steps.desc: Put your straw in. Stir one time very gently. We want a sunrise effect (Orange at bottom, clear at top).

steps.title: Slap the Mint
steps.desc: Put a mint leaf in your hand and CLAP once. This wakes up the smell. Place it on top of the ice.
steps.note: Smelling mint makes it taste fresher!

title: Anti-Gravity Pancakes
subtitle: Breakfast Mission
desc: Master the viscosity of batter and the timing of the perfect flip. Fluffy and golden.

vocab.def: To mix fast and add air bubbles.

steps.title: Dry Team
steps.desc: Get a big bowl. Dump in the Flour, Baking Powder, Sugar, and Salt. Whisk them together so there are no lumps.
steps.note: Baking powder is what makes them puff up.

steps.title: Wet Team
steps.desc: In a jug, mix the Milk, Egg, and Melted Butter. Pour this liquid into the middle of your flour bowl.
steps.note: Make sure butter isn't boiling hot!

steps.title: Lumpy is Good
steps.desc: Stir gently with a spoon. Stop as soon as the white flour disappears. It SHOULD look lumpy. If you mix too much, they get tough.

steps.title: Bubble Watch
steps.desc: Pour some batter onto a hot pan. Wait. Look for bubbles popping on top. When the bubbles stay open like little craters, it's time.

steps.title: The Brave Flip
steps.desc: Slide spatula all the way under. Flip it over fast! It only needs 1 minute on the other side.

title: Code-Red Spaghetti
subtitle: Dinner Mission
desc: Handle boiling water safely and learn the true meaning of 'Al Dente'.

steps.title: Volcano Water
steps.desc: Fill a pot with water. Turn heat to High. Wait for big, angry bubbles (Rolling Boil). Add a big pinch of salt.
steps.note: Water should taste salty like the sea.

steps.title: The Dive
steps.desc: Put the spaghetti in. As it gets soft, push it down with a spoon so it's all underwater. Stir immediately!
steps.note: Don't snap the pasta in half.

steps.title: The Bite Test
steps.desc: Boil for 9 minutes. Ask an adult to fish out one noodle. Cool it, then bite it. If there is a tiny white dot in the middle, it's perfect.

steps.title: Red Fusion
steps.desc: Ask an adult to drain the water. Put pasta back in the pot. Pour in the red sauce and stir on low heat for 1 minute.

steps.title: Snowfall
steps.desc: Put pasta on a plate. Make it snow with Parmesan Cheese. Put a green basil leaf on top.

title: The Golden Fold
subtitle: Egg Mission
desc: Learn temperature control. A fluffy, cheesy omelette that isn't burnt.

vocab.def: To mix fast to add air.

steps.title: Muscle Power
steps.desc: Crack eggs into a bowl. Add Milk, Salt, Pepper. Whisk super fast until it is all yellow and foamy.
steps.note: The more bubbles, the fluffier it gets.

steps.title: Listen to it
steps.desc: Heat pan on Medium. Add butter. If it hisses loudly (SSSS!), it's too hot. We want a gentle whisper.

steps.title: Steering Wheel
steps.desc: Pour eggs in. Pretend the pan is a steering wheel. Tilt it left and right to make the runny egg fill the empty spots.

steps.title: Cheese Trap
steps.desc: When the top is wet but not runny, put Cheese on ONE HALF of the circle only.

steps.title: Close the Book
steps.desc: Slide spatula under the empty half. Fold it over the cheese like closing a book. Press down gently.
steps.note: The heat melts the cheese inside.

title: Rainbow Logic Salad
subtitle: Knife Skills Mission
desc: Practice safe cutting techniques and color theory. No cooking required.

vocab.def: To cut the green top off a strawberry.
To mix salad gently without squishing it.

steps.title: Claw Hand
steps.desc: Make a claw with your holding hand (curl fingers under). Hold the strawberry with the claw. Cut into 4 pieces.

steps.title: Uniformity
steps.desc: Peel the Kiwi/Mango. Cut them into pieces the SAME SIZE as the strawberries.

steps.title: Sweet & Sour
steps.desc: In a cup, mix Honey (Sweet) and Lime Juice (Sour). Stir fast until it becomes thin syrup.

steps.title: Drizzle
steps.desc: Put all fruit in a big bowl. Pour the dressing all over the top.
steps.note: Don't do this until you are ready to eat.

steps.title: The Toss
steps.desc: Use two big spoons. Lift the fruit up and drop it gently to coat it in juice. Sprinkle Mint on top.

title: Binary Choco-Cookies
subtitle: Baking Mission
desc: Chemistry in action. Turn dough into crispy-chewy discs of happiness.

steps.title: Creaming
steps.desc: Put soft butter and sugar in a bowl. Use a spoon to smash them against the side of the bowl until it looks like yellow paste.

steps.title: The Glue
steps.desc: Add the Egg and Vanilla. Mix it in until it's smooth and gloopy.

steps.title: Disappearing Act
steps.desc: Add Flour and Baking Soda. Mix slowly. Stop mixing as soon as the white powder disappears.

steps.title: Social Distancing
steps.desc: Scoop balls of dough onto the tray. Leave big gaps between them because they will grow and spread flat.

steps.title: Patience
steps.desc: Bake at 180°C for 12 mins. When you take them out, they will be SOFT. Let them cool on the tray to get hard.

title: Brain-Boost Smoothie
subtitle: Blender Mission
desc: High-speed physics. Turn solids into liquids using a vortex.

steps.title: Loading Dock
steps.desc: Liquid goes in FIRST (Milk). Soft stuff SECOND (Yogurt). Hard frozen fruit LAST (Banana).

steps.title: Monster Trap
steps.desc: Put the lid on tight. Hold your hand on the lid like you are trapping a monster inside.

steps.title: Pulse Power
steps.desc: Press 'Pulse' button 3 times. Vroom! Vroom! Vroom! This breaks the big ice chunks.

steps.title: Tornado Time
steps.desc: Turn to High speed. Look for the 'Vortex' (tornado shape) in the middle. Count to 20.
steps.note: Stop when it's all one color.

steps.title: Brain Freeze
steps.desc: Pour into a glass. Drink it immediately.
steps.note: Drink slow or your head will hurt!
